node.title: 'It’s not rugby, this is basketball': Ugly melee mars Phoenix's NBL win over United
node.description: Tempers flare as players from both sides scuffle, before South East Melbourne Phoenix ice a 94-86 triumph over the defending champions.
node.content:
["A Mitch Creek dunk has sparked a melee\u00a0in South East Melbourne Phoenix's spiteful 94-86 Throwdown XIII victory over Melbourne United at John Cain Arena.", "Creek spectacularly dunked over United's Matthew Dellavedova late in the third quarter, before he stood\u00a0over his Australian Boomers teammate, who was laid out on the court.", "As Creek taunted Dellavedova\u00a0he was collected in the jaw and\u00a0bumped to the ground by United forward Mason Peatling, who was then set upon by the Phoenix's Izayah Le'afa.", "By this stage, Creek had leapt to his feet and pursued Peatling, as game officials attempted\u00a0to keep players from both sides apart.", "", "
Mitch Creek, left, was bumped by Mason Peatling, setting off a melee in the third quarter.(Getty Images: Kelly Defina)
", "The melee \u2014\u00a0which played out in front of stunned spectators sitting behind the basket \u2014\u00a0was eventually broken up.", "", "
Game and team officials attempted to break up the scuffle.(AAP: Joel Carrett)
", "Peatling was ejected from the game, and Creek and Le'afa were handed\u00a0unsportsmanlike fouls.", "Creek \u2014 who was also hit with a technical foul for taunting Dellavedova \u2014 remained in the game.", "", "
Creek, centre, was restrained by game officials during the aftermath of the melee.(AAP: Joel Carrett)
", "\u201cI\u2019m never going to let anyone play that way,\" Creek told ESPN after the game.", "\"I apologise to people if I took the game into the wrong [place], but I will protect my teammates and protect myself.", "\"That\u2019s not how you play basketball. We had a very hyped\u00a0situation, and a bit of yelling and screaming \u2026\u00a0but that\u2019s no reason to check\u00a0someone.", "", "
The melee\u00a0was triggered by Creek's slam dunk.(Getty Images: Kelly Defina)
", "Creek compiled\u00a0a 16-point haul\u00a0in Phoenix's victory and teammate Zhou Qi posted a game-high 22 points.", "Dellavedova was United's leading scorer, with 19 points, in addition to recording 10 rebounds.", "The Phoenix are undefeated after three games, while United are\u00a0yet to record a win this season."]
